name: PKEraserTool.EraserType
desc: Constants that indicate the behavior of the eraser.

items.name: case vector
items.desc: An eraser that removes an entire drawn line.

items.name: case bitmap
items.desc: An eraser that removes only those portions of the drawing it touches.

items.name: static func == (PKEraserTool.EraserType, PKEraserTool.EraserType) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the two eraser types are the same.

items.name: static func != (PKEraserTool.EraserType, PKEraserTool.EraserType) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the two eraser types arenâ€™t the same.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value representing this eraser tool.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Generates hash values into a hasher structure reference that you provide.
